description: In scene one I tie Maya into a position inspired by a movie I saw a long time ago. Anyone remember the movie poster? In scene two she is suspended in a hip-swiveling body harness that allows the hard spraying water jets to have their way with her. In scene 3 I finally got to do something I have wanted to try for a long time: a full out, fishingline only, suspension. The "after tie" pics are hot in this one too. The last scene shows Maya working with the "neutral buoyancy" concept. As she takes a deep breath, her body rises and pulls the nipple weights off of the tank bottom. Expelling air gives her a break from the torment. Back and forth she goes, from one discomfort to another. Don't you just love predicament bondages?
title: Maya Mathews   In The First Ever   Fishline Only Suspension
